Let us take a moment to introduce ourselves. We’re Harlan Homes, a group of passionate residential property enthusiasts who have brought together our expertise in design, construction and sales to offer a new and refreshing service to Sydney-siders who are looking to bring their dream home to life.

Your home should be as unique as you are – designed to snuggly fit your life and personal style. Our team will work with you to realise your vision and create a home that capitalises on the natural attributes of this iconic harbourside city. It is our mission to to provide a design and build service that is second to none.

el_height=”0.25″][vc_column_text text_color=”color-210407″ uncode_shortcode_id=”185344″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

  1. We blend creativity and pragmatism, thinking outside the square to create exceptional outcomes despite project and site constraints.
  2. We focus 100% on our clients by offering a truly personalised service that will deliver you a home you will genuinely fall head over heels in love with.
  3. We provide a comprehensive turn-key solution ensuring your home includes everything that makes it a home – be it a garden, a pool or even a custom letterbox.
